feed.title: Possible change to the MIT license

entry.title: Possible change to the MIT license
entry.summary: The context provided is a statement made by an unknown individual who is unhappy with the way open source principles are being treated. The person expresses disapproval towards those who are trying to change the fundamental principles of open source due to personal reasons. They state that it is not right to distort the principles of open source just because someone's feelings have been hurt.The individual further emphasizes that this is how open source works and if one does not approve of it, they should refrain from using it. The use of open source software follows a specific set of principles that should not be altered or modified according to personal preferences.In conclusion, the individual in the context expresses a strong opinion regarding the treatment of open source principles. They believe that it is essential to maintain the integrity of open source and not dilute its core values due to personal reasons.
